questions.name: How long does it take to build a medical specialist website?
questions.answer: Typically 4-6 weeks from strategy session to launch. This includes compliance review, design, development, content creation, and rigorous security testing.

questions.name: Do you work with medical practices outside Europe?
questions.answer: We specialize exclusively in European healthcare providers to ensure deep understanding of GDPR, HIPAA-equivalent regulations, and regional healthcare requirements.

questions.name: What ROI can I expect?
questions.answer: Most clients see 120-200% increase in new patient inquiries within 90 days. Our average practice fills their schedule with appropriate referrals within 3-6 months.

questions.name: Can you integrate with my medical records system?
questions.answer: We integrate with most major healthcare systems with strict security protocols, ensuring seamless yet compliant data flow.

questions.name: Do you offer patient portal features?
questions.answer: Yes, we build secure patient portals for appointment scheduling, medical records access, and telehealth integration.

questions.name: What happens after the website launches?
questions.answer: We provide staff training, ongoing compliance monitoring, and continuous optimization to maintain security and performance.
